name: Survive The Night (aleded32)
description:
Wonder what it would be like to play a Modern first person horror game in a PSX style? Wonder no more. This game has you note collecting, while avoiding the a Mysterious and deadly creature lurking around. Using only a flash light, navigate the forest and find all 5 notes before its too late. 

This was for an University Assignment, sadly had to cut a lot of things out towards the end, which would make the game much better. That being said I hope you enjoy and getting scared !!!
